I am a Lead AI Scientist in the Speech team at IBM. My goal is to create profitable products from cutting edge AI often leading to new forntiers in research as well.

<b> Experience </b>: Areas that I have worked in include- speech models (STT-TTS), Efficient AI, Foundation models and time-series analysis. Checkout my [portfolio](portfolio.qmd) for more information on all these.
<br>


<b> Educational Background </b> : I graduated from St. Stephen's College, Delhi and did a masters in Computational science from University College Dublin, where my thesis was in
machine learning.
